name: Tetris (itch) (Olsyx)
description:
What is it about?

This is my version of Tetris (no copyright intended). I developed it as means of a tutorial on my Youtube Channel.

Controls

Up Arrow : Change piece position

Left Arrow : Move piece to the left 

Right Arrow : Move it to the right 

Down Arrow : Currently nothing 

Tools:  Lua and LÖVE2D for development, Photoshop for the graphics.

Note: Darkatom was my old username :)

You can check the code for this game at my Github repository!
